snippet: Actors, screenwriters and directors are hit especially hard.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Amy Sohn outlines ways tax code penalizes artists, particularly those working in film and television industries; notes that issues is primarily due to Alternative Minimum Tax, and it affects everyone from low- to high-income artists; calls for elimination of AMT, and to allow artists in the interim to deduct commission from gross income when filing.
lead_paragraph: Actors, screenwriters and directors are hit especially hard.

headline.print_headline: How the Tax Code Hurts Artists
headline.main: How the Tax Code Hurts Artists
